import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Switch, Route, Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import Profile from "./Profile"; import Auth from "./Auth"; import Header from "./Header"; import NavigationBar from "./NavigationBar"; import './Appearence/index.css' import './Appearence/Auth.css' import Students from "./Students"; export const useRouts = (isAuthenticated, type) => { if (isAuthenticated){ if (type === 'p'){ return (

ПСИХОЛОГ

) } else if (type === 'a') { return (

АДМИНИСТРАТОР

) } else if (type === 'u') { return (

УЧЕНИК

) } } else { return ( ) } }
